English: (How do I get to the Valhalla Server, anyway?)
Chinese: （……要怎麼去瓦爾哈拉伺服器好呢？）

English: (Maybe I should gather info in Kowloon?)

Maybe I'll look for Chitose and join the Rebels.
Maybe I'll join up with the Zaxon guys...
K would know what to do...
Chinese:
去找千歲和反叛者會合好了
可以跟著Zaxon的人……
“K”說不定會知道……？
Korean:
치토세를 찾아 리벨리온즈에 합류하는 게 좋을지도 몰라
잭슨 녀석들을 따라가는 방법도 있지만……
"K"라면 알고 있을지도……?
German:
Chitose und den Rebels anschließen. 
Den Leuten von Zaxon anschließen ...
K wüsste, was zu tun ist ...

English:
(Anyway, I gotta find out how to get to the
Valhalla Server!)
Chinese:
（不管怎樣，都要找到
　去瓦爾哈拉伺服器的方法！）
Korean: (어쨌든, 어떻게 해서든 발할라 서버로 갈 방법을 찾자!)
German:
(Wie dem auch sei, ich muss herausfinden,
wie ich den Walhalla-Server erreichen kann!)
